coe528.project

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • coe528.project.Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    OVERVIEW: The class creates a Customer object consisting of a username password, balance, state and role. The class allows for the customer to deposit withdraw and make online purchases. The class is mutable as it has public getter methods. RI: returns true if c.balance is greater than 0 AND c.deposit is greater than 0 AND (c.withdraw is greater than 0 but less than c.balance) AND (c.onlinePurchase is greater than 0 AND c.onlinePurchase is less than c.balance) AND c.getPass!=null AND c.getUser!=null otherwise, returns false AF(c)= An abstraction function for Customer B B.username=c.username B.password=c.password B.balance=c.balance B.getState=c.getState
